suggestions.original: To improve the line combinations in the artwork, consider refining the transition between the dog's fur and the kennel. This can be achieved by using more cohesive and smoother lines to enhance the visual flow. Additionally, ensure that the lines outlining the different elements, such as the dog, ears, collar, pillow, and kennel, are consistently integrated. This will help in creating a more unified and harmonious composition. Experimenting with varying line thicknesses in these areas can also add depth and interest to the piece.
